Data: Time for the toss: Australia have won the toss and will bat. They are unchanged. Sangakkara says he would have batted first. Three changes for Sri Lanka. Dinesh Chandimal, Chanaka Welegedera and Suraj Randiv come in. No Kulasekara or Perera, and of course no Murali, for he's gone back home after aggravating his groin injury.
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run Dilshan into the act, short and wide and it's cut hard but Dilshan throws himself to his right at point and saves a certain four
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run He used that pull shot to good effect against India and he's repeated it here, but there is a deep square leg in place, just a single this time
Angelo Mathews to Warner, 1 run short on middle, knocked down into the leg side and steals a quick single
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run a slower one this time, pushed it fuller just outside off, dragged towards midwicket

Angelo Mathews to Watson, OUT bowled'im! Played it on, lands on a good length just outside off stump and there is a hint of inward movement, Watson got forward, tried to defend it into the off side, got an inside edge to rattle the stumps
Angelo Mathews to Haddin, no run short of a good length on the off, pushed off the back foot to point
Welegedara to Warner, 1 wide slides it down the leg side to begin with, Warner fails to make contact, called a wide
Welegedara to Warner, 1 run full on middle, it's flicked uppishly through the vacant midwicket region into the deep for a single
Welegedara to Haddin, no run short, teasing the right hander there, got it to move away after pitching, Haddin was tempted to cut but went loosely at it and missed
Welegedara to Haddin, (no ball) 2 runs the cardinal error in a limited-overs game, a front foot no-ball, charges down the track and slaps it past a diving mid-on
Welegedara to Haddin, FOUR runs gets the treatment, just what Haddin wanted, Welegedera doles out a length ball on the off stump, Haddin gets his left foot out of the way and clears mid-off
Welegedara to Haddin, FOUR runs follows that up with a meaty delivery on the legs, flicks it away over mid-on for another four, easily done, effortless
Welegedara to Haddin, no run drives that on the up, bowls it on a good length outside off, cracked straight to extra cover
Welegedara to Haddin, 1 run shortish on middle, jabs it into the leg side through midwicket for a single
Angelo Mathews to Haddin, FOUR runs short and wide and gets the treatment, the third man is up and Haddin finds the gap between him and point, a delightful cut
Angelo Mathews to Haddin, no run pushed off the front foot to extra cover

Angelo Mathews to Haddin, OUT that was unneccessary, change of pace this time, a slower one bowled on a length on the off stump, Haddin was targeting the deep midwicket boundary, was early into the shot, ended up getting a leading edge and the ball landed safely into the palms of the only MP playing international cricket
Angelo Mathews to Warner, no run slides it on the pads, Warner tries to tickle it fine, it clips the pads on the way to the keeper
Angelo Mathews to Warner, no run appeal for lbw, appeared to pitch a hint outside leg stump, it did, nipped back in to rap him on the pads as he tried to whip it square
Angelo Mathews to Warner, 1 leg bye short of a good length outside leg stump, tries to nudge it fine, is struck on the thigh pad

Welegedara to Warner, FOUR runs the third man is up, Welegedera pushed it on a good length, Warner tried to smack him through the line, got a thick outside edge past the keeper and short third man for a streaky boundary
Welegedara to Warner, 2 runs and again, the slower one this time, tries to repeat the shot does Warner, gets a thick edge and it lands just behind Jayasuriya at short third
Welegedara to Warner, 1 leg bye drifting on the pads and Warner misses out while trying to drive it through midwicket, is hit on the pads and he sneaks a leg bye
Welegedara to Clarke, no run short of a good length on the off, nips away, guides it past the keeper but there is a widish slip in place
Welegedara to Clarke, 1 run slower one bowled short outside off, runs it past Dilshan and races through for a single
Welegedara to Warner, 1 run slower one bowled full on the off, crunched to mid-off for a single to keep strike
Randiv to Warner, no run loops it in towards middle and leg from round the wicket, defended cautiously back to the bowler
Randiv to Warner, no run flatter on middle, comes down the track and pushes it to extra cover

Randiv to Warner, OUT brilliantly taken! Excellent reflexes from Jayawardene at slip, it's tossed up a hint this time and Warner's eyes lit up, tried to blaze it through the off side, the ball turned away to take the outside edge and Jayawardene, among the best slip fielders in the game, reacted superbly to snap it moving to his right

Randiv to Hussey, OUT another one goes! Randiv's on a hat-trick. Failed to pick the straighter one, flighted outside off stump, Hussey turned the face to play it through midwicket, stepped out of the crease, missed and Sangakkara did the rest
Randiv to White, no run negotiates it well, short of a good length, some extra bounce as it turns in, gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the off side
Randiv to White, 1 run gets a stride forward this time, defends it into the leg side for a single
Malinga to White, no run defended off the back foot towards cover
Malinga to White, 1 run short of a good length outside off, dabs it past point into the deep for a single
Malinga to Clarke, no run shortish on the off, gets forward and defends it to extra cover
Malinga to Clarke, no run slower offcutter, Clarke gets forward and plays it back with a straight bat
Malinga to Clarke, no run fuller, on a driving length outside off, pushed firmly to extra cover
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run short of a good length outside off, run down to third man for a single
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run flighted on the off stump, driven towards long-on for a single
Randiv to White, FOUR runs had eyed his spot, slightly short, White walked well across, bent low and swept it hard behind square for welcome boundary for Australia
Randiv to White, 1 run turning in from outside off, nudged in front of square leg for a single
Randiv to Clarke, 3 runs went on straight, the right amount of bounce for Clarke to make a bit of room and dab it wide of short third man for three runs
Randiv to White, 1 run played inside the line to that one, tried to push it straight, got an outside edge in front of point for another single
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run short on the off, waits for it to turn in and punches it towards deep cover for one more
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run lands on a good length on the off, no spin on sight, defended towards point
Mendis to White, no run the legspinner, didn't turn much, pushed firmly to short extra cover
Mendis to White, no run the offspinner there, turned in sharply to strike him on the pads
Mendis to White, SIX runs pitched up and White senses an opportunity, swings it hard over wide long-on and clears the ropes comfortably
Mendis to White, 1 run leans forward and punches it towards long-off for a single
Mendis to Clarke, 2 runs a long hop and Clarke will be disappointed he didn't smash that away, mistimes a pull wide of deep square leg but still gets a couple
Randiv to White, no run driven firmly to extra cover
Randiv to White, no run on the pads, White defends awkwardly after leaning across

Randiv to White, no run is that a missed stumping? down the leg side, White was down the track when he misses the ball, Sangakkara can't collect and it rolls to short fine leg, perhaps there was a deflection off the pads as it wasn't called a wide
Randiv to White, 1 run
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run poked towards point for a quick single
Randiv to White, FOUR runs rocks back to make room, and takes toll of the short ball served up, crunches it powerfully past point for four
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run fullish and pitching just outside off, driven towards mid-on
Mendis to White, 1 run shorter this time and wider, prodded towards cover for a single
Mendis to Clarke, no run gets well forward and defends to the off side
Mendis to Clarke, no run bat and pad close together as he blocks cautiously again
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run driven along the ground towards long-off for a single
Mendis to White, 2 runs pre-meditated paddle towards short fine from outside off by White
Mendis to Hussey, no run length ball sliding down leg, turned to short fine
Mendis to Hussey, 1 run misses out on the full toss on legstump, could have whacked it where he wanted, but only manages to get it to deep backward square
Mendis to White, FOUR runs shortish ball outside off, White makes room to free his arms, swings at the ball but gets a thick edge which takes the ball over backward point for four
Mendis to White, SIX runs this is a beautiful hit, again makes room and carves it inside-out over deep extra cover for six, lovely
Mendis to White, no run blocked back to the bowler this time
Mendis to White, 1 run shuffles towards the offstump and clips the ball in front of square leg to et the single which brings up a fifty he can be proud of
Malinga to White, FOUR runs full and down the leg side, White gets a fine tickle on it, Sangakkara dives and manages to get a hand on it but can't take off enough pace to stop it from going for four
Malinga to White, 1 run Malinga shows us his yorker-on-demand ability, squeezed out towards point
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run yorker on offstump, dug out in front of point for a single
Malinga to White, no run guess what? another yorker, on middle this time, blocked back to the bowler
Malinga to White, no run nope, sticks to the pinpoint yorker routine, on offstump, defended down the pitch
Malinga to White, 1 run shortish this time for variety, on offstump, White pushes it towards extra cover and takes the single to keep strike
Randiv to Clarke, no run length ball on legstump, tucked towards midwicket
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run again on the pads, this time it is nudged to square leg for a single
Randiv to White, no run angling towards off this time, played towards mid-off

Randiv to White, 1 run Dropped by Mendis, should have been taken though it was a bit tough, White top-edges a sweep which lobs to the left of Mendis, who can't hang on after making good ground, the bowler lets him have an earful
Randiv to Clarke, no run used his feet, defended to covers

Randiv to Clarke, OUT Randiv's super day continues, Clarke makes room to cut, he misses and the off bail is on the floor, there's some confusion whether the ball hit stumps or whether it was the keeper's gloves that dislodged the bail, replays show the ball hit the top of offstump, and Clarke has to go
Angelo Mathews to White, 2 runs starts with a slow bouncer, swung towards deep square leg where Jayasuriya races across to field
Angelo Mathews to White, FOUR runs streaky four, short of length and outside off, comes in a touch after pitching, gets the outside edge past the keeper and too fine for short third
Angelo Mathews to White, 1 run much fuller, driven down to long-off for a comfortable single
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run length ball heading for off, gets forward and pushes towards extra cover
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run length ball and just outside off, driven down to long-off this time
Angelo Mathews to White, 1 run length ball outside off, gets on the front foot and pushes it towards extra cover
Welegedara to White, 1 run Welegedara picks up the yorkers thread from Malinga, he starts with one heading for middle stump, prodded towards cover
Welegedara to Hussey, 1 run full and wide, Hussey mistimes a punch to cover
Welegedara to White, 1 run a low full toss on legstump, eased down to long-on for a single
Welegedara to Hussey, 1 run low full toss just outside off, super stuff from Welegedara, Hussey whips it in front of square leg for a single
Welegedara to White, SIX runs not so super this time as his full toss on middle stump isn't low enough, White gets under it and absolutely powers it to the sightscreen, brutal from White

Welegedara to White, SIX runs undoes all the good work at the start of the over with another hit-me ball, on legstump this time, White gets his front leg out of the way and dismisses it over wide long-on, did I mention White's a powerful batsmen?
Malinga to Hussey, FOUR runs now a delicate touch to get runs, a knee-high full toss outside off, Hussey spots that fine leg is up, he paddles it over the man for four
Malinga to Hussey, 2 runs more finesse from Hussey , provided a bit of room and the batsman carves it wide of deep backward point, where the fielder has to dive to stop another boundary

Malinga to Hussey, FOUR runs Australia show their resilience yet again, shortish ball, Hussey charges down the track and crunches the ball over cover and beat sweeper cover at the rope for four more, ten off the first three balls
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run full and wide, a bit of an outside edge sends the ball fizzing to third man
Malinga to White, 1 run not quite a yorker from Malinga, very full on middle, driven back to the bowler

Malinga to Hussey, FOUR runs lovely shot by Hussey, full delivery just outside off, Hussey paddles it nonchalantly to the fine leg boundary, not an easy stroke to play against a bowler of Malinga's pace, but you wouldn't think that seeing Hussey play it
Welegedara to White, 1 run defended towards short midwicket, a sharp single is taken, a direct hit from Chandimal would have sent back White
Welegedara to Hussey, no run short of length, Hussey looks to swing to the leg side, he misses and the ball sails to the keeper
Welegedara to Hussey, no run pitched up and outside off, punched towards short cover
Welegedara to Hussey, no run length ball outside off, Hussey is content to leave it to the keeper
Welegedara to Hussey, no run another dot ball, length delivery on off, turned towards mid-on but straight at the fielder
Welegedara to Hussey, 1 run gets the single this time, driving down to long-off and ambles through
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run short of length and outside off, gets an outside edge, the ball is in the air for a touch as it goes towards third man
Angelo Mathews to White, 1 run low full toss on offstump, bunted down to long-off for a single
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run short of length and angling just outside off, nicely steered towards third man off the back foot
Angelo Mathews to White, FOUR runs slugs that slow bouncer from well outside off to wide long-on, pure power from White
Angelo Mathews to White, 1 run length ball heading for off, muscled back down the track, hits the bowler's ankle as he is in his follow-through and then rolls towards cover

Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run a slow delivery from Mathews, Hussey carves it towards backward point, where Dilshan collects and fires it to the bowler's end, Mathews breaks the stumps but Hussey's full-length dive makes sure he's safe, third umpire is called to make the decision though, one replay is enough to confirm Hussey's not out
Mendis to White, SIX runs six more, Australia on the rampage here, a bit of flight from Mendis, full and outside off. more power-hitting from White, this time over long-off, flat hit for six
Mendis to White, no run he comes into play first up when White drives firmly down the ground
Mendis to White, (no ball) free-hit coming up as Mendis oversteps by a big way, punched to extra cover
Mendis to White, no run White powers the ball straight down the ground, Dilshan runs across to cut it off
Mendis to White, SIX runs no one's cutting this one off, white dances down the track and clubs over long-off for six, nearly took out the cameraman there
Mendis to White, 1 run between Dilshan and extra cover for a single this time
Mendis to Hussey, 1 run Hussey reverse-sweep a ball from offstump to Jayasuriya at short third for a single
Malinga to Hussey, SIX runs it's raining sixes here, a not-so-low full toss just outside off, Hussey smacks it straight for six
Malinga to Hussey, FOUR runs oh dear, Sri Lanka have really lost the plot towards the end of the innings, Hussey makes room and swings the ball over mid-on for four this time
Malinga to Hussey, 2 runs a full toss well outside off, cracked towards sweeper cover for two more
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run full and just outside off, along the ground to extra cover
Malinga to White, 1 run good delivery, a yorker on legstump, White backs away and pushes it towards mid-on to bring up the century stand
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run swung to long-on for a single, Australia finish on 168 for 5, what a comeback by Australia, similar to what they did against Bangaldesh

Wow, 91 runs from the last seven overs. Australia show again that it's not enough to get rid of their top-order, that they can fight back from really tough situations. They haven't won the game yet though, Sri Lanka's batsmen have a tough ask ahead of them though. Remains to be seen whether they opt to open with Jayasuriya or Dilshan.

Jayasuriya will open and with him is the in-form Jayawardene. Sri Lanka have a tough task ahead, after squandering the early advantage with the ball to be left chasing a challenging target. Dirk Nannes has the ball; he troubled India aplenty with his nippy short deliveries. Two slips.
Nannes to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run starts with a full toss on leg stump, flicked to fine leg for a single
Nannes to Jayasuriya, 2 runs Jayasuriya's away, fullish on middle, chips it wide of mid-on for a couple of runs
Nannes to Jayasuriya, no run tight line, bowled on a good length on the off, gets forward and defends it cautiously back to the bowler
Nannes to Jayasuriya, 1 leg bye shortish on the off, nips in just a touch, strikes him high on the thighs as he tries to turn the face
Nannes to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run angling it away from the right hander, guided down towards third man for a single
Nannes to Jayasuriya, 1 run full on the off stump, driven straight to mid-off, calls for a single and Jayawardene responds, the throw is to the keeper's end but misses its mark
Tait to Jayasuriya, 1 wide full and way wide, Jayasuriya doesn't have to reach for that one, called by the umpire
Tait to Jayasuriya, no run beats him this time as he tries to punch that hard, lands on a good length and whizzes past the outside edge
Tait to Jayasuriya, no run short of a good length on middle, moves across and hint and taps it back to the bowler
Tait to Jayasuriya, 1 run slows it up this time, fullish on middle and leg, worked wide of mid-on for a single
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide short and wide, slashes hard at that one, misses, would be disappointed he missed out there, but he'll take the wide
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run straying on the pads, gets across just a touch and flicks it elegantly down to fine leg

Tait to Jayasuriya, no run Jayasuriya didn't know where that went, banged in short on middle, closed the face on that one but he was surprised by the extra bounce, caught him on the glove and it lobbed up into the off side
Tait to Jayasuriya, no run banged in short outside off, gets out of the way and allows it through
Nannes to Mahela Jayawardene, no run beaten, angles it away from Jayawardene, short of a good length, Jayawardene thought of playing at it but chose to withdraw, after it had gone past him
Nannes to Mahela Jayawardene, SIX runs picked the length early and cleared the ropes with ease, fraction short on middle and leg, swivelled and pulled it handsomely over deep square leg
Nannes to Jayasuriya, no run fuller, pushed into the leg side towards midwicket
Nannes to Jayasuriya, no run short of a good length on the off, punched off the back foot in front of point
Nannes to Jayasuriya, no run hurled it short on middle, took his bottom hand off that one and knocked it towards square leg
Tait to Sangakkara, 2 runs makes room first up, shortish outside off, cracks it wide of a diving point who gets a finger to it and keeps it down to two
Tait to Sangakkara, no run full on middle and off, defended solidly towards mid-off
Tait to Dilshan, FOUR runs Almost had Dilshan as well, Tait bangs that one on middle and it takes off, Dilshan shapes up for the pull, it brushes the glove and evades Haddin as he leaps
Tait to Dilshan, no run slower one bowled full on the off, defended towards midwicket
Tait to Dilshan, no run shortish outside off, punched off the back foot towards point
Nannes to Jayasuriya, 1 run missed run-out, played to point and there is some hesitation in taking the single, there is an aim at the non-striker's end but it misses its target
Nannes to Dilshan, 2 runs bowls it on a good length on middle, swings it past a diving square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
Nannes to Dilshan, no run doesn't want to restrain himself on that pull shot, short outside off and he misses, too quick
Nannes to Dilshan, 1 run pitched it on a good length on middle, pushed towards mid-off where David Hussey fumbles
Nannes to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs he begins well, it's bowled short outside off and he succeeds in pulling it wide of mid-on for a welcome boundary
Watson to Dilshan, FOUR runs Dilshan seizes on that pitched-up delivery, enough width for him to caress that between mid-off and extra cover
Watson to Dilshan, SIX runs a length delivery doled out by Watson and Dilshan isn't going to waste these, clears the long-on boundary with one clean strike
Watson to Dilshan, no run held back the length just slightly, crunched towards extra cover
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run short on middle, pulled away on the bounce to deep square leg
Watson to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs Mathews joins in, Watson's getting smacked, not quite pitched up but in the slot nevertheless as he aims straight, lofts it over the bowler's head for a boundary
Watson to Angelo Mathews, no run misses out, the legcutter by Watson but he fails to pull it through midwicket
Johnson to Dilshan, 2 runs shortish outside off, guides it just wide of third man, scampers back for the second
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 wide attempted bouncer but it's down the leg side, tries to pull, misses, called a wide
Johnson to Chandimal, no run short of a good length outside off, slashes hard, can't make any contact
Johnson to Chandimal, no run came onto him quickly, short of a good length and took off, raps him on the glove as he tries to dab it behind point
Johnson to Chandimal, 1 run tries to punch that off the back foot, gets a thick outside edge towards third man
Smith to Chandimal, 1 run angling it on middle and leg, worked behind square for a single
Smith to Kapugedera, 1 wide tries to sweep it down fine, misses, it's a wide down the leg side
Smith to Kapugedera, 1 run flighted on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Smith to Chandimal, 1 run full toss on middle, pushed towards long-on for one more
Smith to Kapugedera, no run tossed it up on the off, comes down the track and drives it to extra cover
Smith to Kapugedera, no run kept it flat this time and held back the length, got forward and defended it to cover
Smith to Kapugedera, 1 run cracked off the front foot towards deep cover for a single
Johnson to Kapugedera, 1 run short of a good length on the off, knocks it down in front of cover

Johnson to Chandimal, 2 runs edged and superbly stopped at third man, there is a slip in place but it evades him, it's rolling towards the boundary but Daniel Christian, the substitute, dives full length to his left and hauls it back in

Johnson to Chandimal, 1 run dropped, short on middle, goes for the pull, not at all in control, gets a top edge and Clarke, at square leg, chases it running back, dives and tries to snatch it with one hand, can't quite hold on
Johnson to Kapugedera, no run
Johnson to Kapugedera, FOUR runs slower one bowled full outside off, lofted it into that gap between long-off and deep cover for a boundary
Johnson to Kapugedera, 1 run shortish outside off, pushed into the deep on the off side for a single
Smith to Kapugedera, 1 leg bye fullish on middle and leg, comes down the track and tries to drive it through midwicket, clips the pads and rolls into the leg side
Smith to Chandimal, 1 run pushed just wide of extra cover to steal a quick single
Smith to Kapugedera, 1 run flighted on the off, driven through the line to long-off for a single

Smith to Chandimal, no run Haddin had a chance to stump him there, came down the track to drive it into the leg side, got an inside edge onto the pads, rolled into the off side, Haddin collected and tried to flick it back onto the stumps but missed
Smith to Chandimal, no run pushed back slightly uppishly towards the bowler
Smith to Chandimal, 1 run driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Watson to Chandimal, no run pretty high, bounced it on the off, tried to pull with his feet in the air, missed, one for the over, surprised that wasn't given a wide
Watson to Chandimal, 1 run short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to deep cover
Watson to Kapugedera, 1 run shortish on middle, turned through square leg for a single
Watson to Chandimal, 1 run lands on a good length outside off, tries to crash that over mid-off, gets a thick outside edge to third man
Watson to Kapugedera, 1 run slower one bowled short on the off, dabs it just wide of short third man for a single
Watson to Chandimal, no run low full toss on the off stump which is played back gently to the bowler
Smith to Kapugedera, 1 run flighted on the off, comes down the track and drives it to long-on
Smith to Chandimal, 1 run makes room and drives it towards long-off for a single
Smith to Kapugedera, no run flighted on middle, sweeps it down towards short fine leg
Smith to Randiv, 1 run cut towards point for a single
Smith to Chandimal, 1 run pushed to long-off for a single
Watson to Chandimal, 2 runs short on the off, pulled wide of long-on for a couple of runs
Watson to Chandimal, FOUR runs finds the boundary, fine leg was a little too square and he beat that fielder, short on leg stump and he swivels to strike that really fine for a boundary
Watson to Chandimal, no run full on middle, driven back to the bowler who palms it off to midwicket
Watson to Chandimal, 1 run slower one bowled short on the off, cracked towards deep cover for a single
Watson to Malinga, no run short of a good length outside off, makes room and leaves it be
Smith to Chandimal, no run comes down the track and pushes it to extra cover
Smith to Chandimal, no run fullish on the off, plays it with a straight bat
Smith to Mendis, no run shortish, played into the leg side off the back foot
Smith to Mendis, no run gets forward and defends him confidently into the off side
Smith to Mendis, no run pushes it full on middle, digs it out back to the bowler
Johnson to Malinga, no run short of a good length from round the wicket, pushed back to the bowler
Johnson to Malinga, no run fullish outside off, makes room to loft that over extra cover, misses
Johnson to Malinga, no run full and wide, makes room to swipe that through cover, misses again
Johnson to Malinga, no run goes past the outside edge again, short, makes room to guide it to third man, makes no contact
Johnson to Malinga, 1 run full outside off, makes room and plays that with an open face to third man
Johnson to Mendis, no run how did that miss, aiming at the blockhole, almost gets it right as Mendis makes room, misses off stump by a whisker
Clarke to Malinga, no run flighted on the off, pushed straight to extra cover
Clarke to Mendis, no run defends it back to the bowler with a still head
Clarke to Mendis, 1 run charges down the track to clear mid-off, gets a thick outside edge to point, just the single
Clarke to Welegedara, no run played back to the bowler
Clarke to Welegedara, 1 run driven towards long-off to keep the strike
Johnson to Welegedara, 1 run low full toss outside off, driven towards deep point for a single

That's all we have from here folks. Thanks for tuning in and sending us your feedback. It's goodbye from all of us here at Cricinfo. And oh by the way, exciting news for cricket fans in the USA - the first ever Twenty20 internationals on American soil will take place in Florida on May 20, 22 and 23rd when Sri Lanka will play New Zealand in three Twenty2
White is the Man of the Match

Australia, looking unstoppable this tournament, have more or less qualified for the semis with this comprehensive win. Their top order had been blown away during their innings but Cameron White stepped to score an unbeaten 85 to revive his team. Their bowlers were ruthless, chipping away constantly to ensure there remained no hope for Sri Lanka. We'll g
Australia won by 81 runs
Player of the match is Cameron White, AUS
